GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct form of used to in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
1. Iused toswim every day, but now I'm too lazy.
2. Ididn't use to|never used to|did not use toread at school, but now I love books.
3. Did youuse toeat meat?
4. Hedidn't use to|never used to|did not use tobe interested in cars but now he is.
5. Iused todrink fizzy drinks. Now I just drink water.
6. Did theyuse towork together?
7. Where did youuse togo on Saturday nights?
8. It didn't use to|never used to|did not use torain so much. Now it rains all the time.
9. What did youuse todo in the holidays?
10. My teacher used totell stories every Friday afternoon - they were great.
